name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES, Appellant, v. WASHINGTON COUNTY

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES, Appellant, v. WASHINGTON COUNTY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gail B. Phelps, Asst. Counsel, Bureau of Regulatory Counsel and Keith Welks, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Katherine B. Emery, Washington, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
639 A.2d 1171
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL RESOURCES, Appellant, v. WASHINGTON COUNTY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 9, 1994.
Decided March 30, 1994.
Gail B. Phelps, Asst. Counsel, Bureau of Regulatory Counsel and Keith Welks, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Katherine B. Emery, Washington, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
